Text.Page: Now, let's see how you set up Glyphs and EP.
After arriving in Velikâ€™s Sanctum, you started your training to become a true hero.

Right, it's time you equipped your glyphs and gear, and set up your EP.

Press on your keyboard to bring up the inventory, and use Mystel's Awakened Glyph Box to receive a glyph.

Now let me explain the EP system.

You can find the EP window by clicking My Character -> EP.
Decide which EP you want to increase and spend the points to strengthen your character.

Excellent!

Now, there's a few things I need to tell you about skill advancement.

You can improve your skills by going to My Character -> Skills (K) -> Advance Skills.
Once you've done your skill advancement, press to open your inventory and use the Echo: Valkyon Wants You item to progress to the next stage.

Good work!

Now let me say a few words about companions.

Press to open your inventory and use the Partner: Dopey Cocomin scroll to register a partner.
After completing the Companion tutorial, use the Echo: Cultists' Conspiracy item to proceed to the next stage.

Nice!

Time to make you familiar with the card collection. Press to open your inventory, and use the Card Fragment - Starlight Festival Elin and Card Fragment - Blood Festival Elin items.

Good work up to now, keep it up!

Next, we're going to turn our hand to fighting monsters.
Before we start, make sure you're carrying a weapon and have put your armor on.

That's it! You're ready to make a name for yourself in Arborea.

Are you ready to return?
